name: Ur
content:
Ur was a male Tusken Raider who lived on the desert planet of Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War. He was famous for slaying two Gamorrean guards during a territorial skirmish with the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure. Ur had a younger brother named Urur, who was restricted to defending their tribe. If Ur was killed, Urur would take his place within the tribe. Ur wore desert-colored robes with two bandoliers strapped diagonally across both sides of the chest above the belt, and the standard Tusken mask. He wielded a Gaderffii. Ur preferred dewback meat over other Tatooine fare.
Ur was first mentioned on a card for the Premiere set of Decipher, Inc.'s 2001 Jedi Knights Trading Card Game, simultaneously with his brother Urur's accompanying card.
